title: rl/genomeannotation pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fasta.errorMessage: Fasta file for the assembly to be annotated cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa' or '.fasta'

RNAseq.errorMessage: Directory containing fastq files for RNAseq reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have names 'id_1.fastq.gz' and 'id_2.fastq.gz'

Isoseq.errorMessage: FastQ file for Isoseq reads cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
